Interrogator: Describe the conversation between the boy and the chef.
Interrogee: Yes. When the delivery boy got there to take the order, the chef told him, "Why are you always late? Your reviews and ratings are also bad." That's it. And the boy told him, "Mind your work. It's not my problem."

Interrogator: How was the behavior of the delivery boy towards the chef?
Interrogee: He was angry at the chef because the chef said, "Your rating is not good."

Interrogator: Who was the delivery boy delivering the package to? Can you describe that person?
Interrogee: Yeah, he was delivering the package to a woman. She was wearing a red kurti, and her hair was blonde.

Interrogator: So how was the behavior of that woman, to whom the package was going to be delivered, towards the delivery boy?
Interrogee: She was kind. She also gave him a tip of 400 dollars, which is a large amount. The boy was happy with the tip, and the lady also offered him a drink because it's a party night, but the boy declined and said that the tip is enough for him.

Interrogator: What was in the delivery package?
Interrogee: The food that the lady ordered for the party.

Interrogator: So after delivering the package to the woman, what happened?
Interrogee: After delivering the package, the boy left the place, but as feedback, he got a message that said, "Please save me. I'm in danger." So after some time, after thinking for some time, he went inside the room and saw that things were not in their right place. He got suspicious, and there was a noise coming from the inner room. So he went to the inner room and saw a man lying in the tub, and he was dead. After some time, he also saw the same lady, and the lady said, "You must not be here now. I will kill you."

Interrogator: What was written in the message that you got?
Interrogee: Already told that it was written, "Please save me. I'm in danger." So he got a text message on his phone.

Interrogator: Describe what the delivery boy saw when he entered the house.
Interrogee: When he entered the house, he saw that things were not in the right place, and after some time, a noise was coming from inside the room. So he got suspicious and went inside the room.

Interrogator: While inspecting the inner room because he heard the noise, what did he find?
Interrogee: When he entered the room, he saw a man lying in a tub, and he was dead.

Interrogator: Why do you think he was dead?
Interrogee: He was underwater.

Interrogator: Did you see any blood or anything like that?
Interrogee: I don't.

Interrogator: Where was the lady of the house?
Interrogee: She was doing some work, but after she saw the delivery boy, she said, "You must not be here now. I will kill you." That's it.

Interrogator: Okay, so can you describe that scene where she saw the delivery boy?
Interrogee: She saw the delivery boy inside the room where the dead body was, and the things were here and there. I thought there's a fight between that man, the dead man, and the lady. So the things were not in place.

Interrogator: Was there any conversation between the boy and the lady?
Interrogee: Yeah, when he delivered the order, she was very kind and gave him a tip of 400 dollars and also offered him a drink as it was a party night. But the boy declined.

Interrogator: When he entered the house, what was the conversation between the woman and the boy?
Interrogee: When he entered the inner room, he saw the man lying in the tub, and he was dead. After some time, he also saw the woman, and the woman said, "You must not be here now. I will kill you." That's it.

Interrogator: So was anyone hurt?
Interrogee: Yeah, when the woman pointed the gun at the boy, she slipped and shot herself by mistake.

Interrogator: Why did she shoot herself?
Interrogee: In the chest.

Interrogator: So was the delivery boy carrying any weapon?
Interrogee: Hmmm.

Interrogator: So after she shot herself accidentally, what happened?
Interrogee: The delivery boy got shocked and left the place.

Interrogator: So you are saying the delivery boy did not kill the woman?
Interrogee: Yeah, she shot herself.

Interrogator: So you are saying she killed herself?
Interrogee: Yeah.

Interrogator: After that, the boy just left the place?
Interrogee: Yeah, he just left the place.

Interrogator: He didn't do anything else?
Interrogee: No.
